jhelp.util.thread

Class ThreadedVerySimpleTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadedTask<PARAMETER,java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void>
      • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadedSimpleTask<java.lang.Void>
        • jhelp.util.thread.ThreadedVerySimpleTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemorySweeper.Sweeper, StateMachine

    public abstract class ThreadedVerySimpleTask
extends ThreadedSimpleTask<java.lang.Void>
    Threaded task very simple.
    It acts like ThreadedTask but with no parameter, result, nor progress.
    It is use full when need do task with no parameter and no waiting result
    Author:
    JHelp
